snippet: A man was executed on Wednesday for setting a fire that killed his 18-month-old daughter and her two young half-sisters at an East Texas home 15 years ago.
abstract: Texas executes Raphael Holiday for setting fire that killed his 18-month-old daughter and her two young half-sisters, making him 13th convicted killer put to death in state in 2015.
lead_paragraph: A man was executed on Wednesday for setting a fire that killed his 18-month-old daughter and her two young half-sisters at an East Texas home 15 years ago.

headline.main: Texas: Killer of Three Is Executed
headline.print_headline: Texas: Killer of Three Is Executed
